doc.title: Charge of the French Cuirassieurs
doc.plot: "This is one of the most successful cavalry charges ever shown in a moving picture. The entire regiment appears at first in the distance. The galloping horses speedily bring them into close view, and they dash by the camera at a furious pace, the sun gleaming on their sabres and their steel helmets and breast-plates. Several horses fall in the furious onslaught."
